full_title: Drink N Dance by Future & Metro Boomin
title: Drink N Dance

description.plain: “Drink N Dance” is the second song on Future & Metro Boomin’s second 2024 collaboration album  WE STILL DON’T TRUST YOU featuring additional vocals by Chris Brown. This song talks about their lavish lifestyles, specifically referencing penthouse suites, and luxurious experiences
